thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 18 of 539
thread.title: Katie

author: Katie
title: Katie
text: I was confused by their sizing charts - according to their measurements, I should have ordered a Large. I knew that wasn't right, so I ordered a Small and a Medium. The Small ended up fitting perfectly, so I just returned the Medium. Their return process was very easy and straight forward! I am very happy with the dress, I just think they need to update their sizing charts.
